backend/main.mo: Main actor defining data types (UserProfile, Post, Reply, Conversation, Message, Report, ModerationAction) and state management for a debate platform with profile management, posts, messaging, moderation, and authorization using mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms OldUserProfile to NewUserProfile by adding a pinterest field to SocialMediaLinks, defaulting it to null for existing profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three Pinterest-related features: adding Pinterest input to ProfileSetupModal, displaying Pinterest link on ProfilePage, and enabling Pinterest editing in profile functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Summaries of frontend components and pages, noting that ProfileSetupModal and ProfilePage already include Pinterest alongside Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram social media links.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including background, foreground, primary, secondary, accent, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Global Activist Debate application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, four debate sections (civil, aggressive, quotes, random), profile, messaging, random debate, and moderator dashboard, wrapped in ThemeProvider with ProfileSetupModal.
frontend/src/components/ConversationList: Displays a list of conversations with participant names and last message preview, highlighting the selected conversation and filtering out the current user from participants.
frontend/src/components/CreatePostForm.t: Form component for creating posts with content textarea, optional image upload with preview, and section-specific submission, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/components/DebateStyleBadge: Renders a colored badge component displaying the debate style (Civil, Aggressive, Creative, or Random) with corresponding theme colors.
frontend/src/components/DebateStyleSelec: Provides a grid of selectable cards for choosing between Civil and Aggressive debate styles, each with an icon, description, and visual selection state.
frontend/src/components/FollowButton.tsx: Displays a follow/unfollow button for user profiles, checking current follow status and toggling it via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout with sticky header, logo, navigation (Messages, Moderator for admins), mobile menu sheet, footer with social links, and section navigation sidebar.
frontend/src/components/LikeButton.tsx: Like button with heart icon that toggles like state for posts and shows a hover card listing users who liked the post.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/MessageThread.ts: Displays a conversation thread with participant list, scrollable message history, and a textarea form for sending new messages.
frontend/src/components/ModerationAction: Provides moderation action buttons (warning, strike, ban) for reports with user history display and progressive enforcement logic.
frontend/src/components/PlatformRules.ts: Displays a card grid showing the four main platform rules (no personal attacks, opinions only, civil debates, aggressive debates) with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Renders a post card with author info, content, media, section badge, pinned indicator, like/reply buttons, and collapsible reply section.
frontend/src/components/PostFeed.tsx: Displays a sorted list of PostCard components with optional pinned-first sorting and empty state message.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup, collecting username, avatar, interests, debate style, and social media links. Prevents dismissal until profile is created.
frontend/src/components/RandomDebateButt: Button component that navigates to the random debate partner matching page with gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/ReplySection.tsx: Displays replies to a post with timestamps and user links, includes a form for authenticated users to add new replies and report buttons.
frontend/src/components/ReportButton.tsx: Small flag button that opens the report modal for authenticated users to report content violations.
frontend/src/components/ReportList.tsx: Displays a list of content reports with violation type, status badges, timestamps, and moderation actions for pending reports.
frontend/src/components/ReportModal.tsx: Modal form for submitting content reports with violation type selection and description textarea.
frontend/src/components/SectionNavigatio: Horizontal navigation bar with icon buttons for different debate sections (civil, aggressive, quotes, random) with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/StartConversatio: Modal form for initiating direct or group conversations by entering another user's principal ID.
frontend/src/components/UserLink.tsx: Clickable user link component displaying avatar and username, navigates to user profile page on click.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on authentication state, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, posts (create, like, reply), conversations, messages, reports, and moderation actions with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, activist brand colors (blue, green, orange), and utility classes for scrollbar hiding and color application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, random debate button, latest discussions feed, and platform rules sidebar with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/MessagingPage.tsx: Two-column messaging interface showing conversation list and message thread with new conversation modal, requiring authentication to access.
frontend/src/pages/ModeratorDashboard.ts: Admin-only dashboard displaying reports in tabs (pending, reviewed, resolved) with warning progression system (3 warnings → 1 strike → ban).
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays user profile page with avatar, username, debate style badge, follow button, interests, social media links, and a feed of the user's posts filtered by author principal.
frontend/src/pages/RandomDebatePage.tsx: Provides UI for random debate matching where authenticated users can select a debate style and opt-in to find a debate partner, with a waiting state animation (backend matching logic not yet implemented).
frontend/src/pages/SectionPage.tsx: Renders section-specific pages (Civil Debate, Aggressive Debate, Quotes & Poems, Random Debates) with filtered post feeds, create post form, and platform rules sidebar.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining the Global Activist Debate platform architecture, including authentication, debate categorization, moderation system, messaging, and tracking implemented features mapped to requirements.
